welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tehran, Iran! Get ready to be captivated by the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and breathtaking architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Ekhtiyar Dizi (دیزی سرای اختیار)
restaurants.description: Ekhtiyar Dizi (دیزی سرای اختیار) is a dizi place located in تهران.

restaurants.name: Nikoo Sefat Aash (آش نیکو صفت)
restaurants.description: Nikoo Sefat Aash (آش نیکو صفت) is a ash and haleem place located in تهران.
restaurants.address: South Jamalzadeh St. (Azadi St.), تهران, تهران

restaurants.name: Bamshad Jegaraki (جگرکی بامشاد)
restaurants.description: Bamshad Jegaraki (جگرکی بامشاد) is a bbq joint located in تهران.

restaurants.name: Fekr Café (کافه فکر)
restaurants.description: Fekr Café (کافه فکر) is a café located in تهران.
restaurants.address: No. 7, Pourjavadi De., Daneshgah St., Enghelab St., تهران, تهران

restaurants.name: Cluna (کلانا)
restaurants.description: Cluna (کلانا) is a snack place located in تهران.
restaurants.address: North Karegar St. (Nosrat St.), تهران, تهران

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
